org.omancode.rmt.cellreader.narrow
Class NarrowUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.omancode.rmt.cellreader.narrow.NarrowUtil

public final class NarrowUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Performs type checking and conversion on Object values.

Version:
$Revision: 9 $
Author:
Oliver Mannion

Method Detail

calcNarrowestType

public static java.lang.Class<?> calcNarrowestType(java.lang.Object[] values,
                                                   boolean allowMissing)
Calculate the narrowest possible type for an array of Objects.

Parameters:
values - array of Object to calculate narrowest type for
allowMissing - allow values that are empty string or null
Returns:
narrowest possible type that will not reduce fidelity of any of the objects

narrowArray

public static java.lang.Object[] narrowArray(java.lang.Object[] array)
                                      throws NarrowException
Narrow the array to the smallest possible type without losing fidelity.

Parameters:
array - array to narrow
Returns:
narrowed array
Throws:
NarrowException - if problem narrowing row

narrowArray

public static java.lang.Object[] narrowArray(java.lang.Object[] values,
                                             java.lang.Class<?> toType,
                                             boolean convertMissing)
                                      throws NarrowException
Narrow the array to the specified type.

Parameters:
values - array to narrow
toType - type to narrow to
convertMissing - convert missing values
Returns:
values converted to smallest possible type
Throws:
NarrowException - if a value cannot be narrowed.

narrowArray

public static java.lang.Object[] narrowArray(java.lang.Object[] values,
                                             java.lang.Class<?>[] narrowTypes,
                                             boolean convertMissing)
                                      throws NarrowException
Narrow each value in values to the type specified in the parallel array narrowTypes.

Parameters:
values - array of different values to narrow
narrowTypes - parrallel array that specifies the type to narrow the corresponding values value to
convertMissing - whether to convert missing values to there corresponding integer/double representation
Returns:
narrowed version of values
Throws:
NarrowException - if problem narrowing

narrowed type

NarrowException - if problem narrowing
